aria-label.description: Accessible label to describe what is loading

aria-labelledBy.description: Id of element which describes what is being loaded

aria-valuetext.description: Text describing that current loading status or progress

className.description: Additional classes added to the Spinner.

diameter.description: Diameter of spinner set as CSS variable

isInline.description: Indicates the spinner is inline and the size should inherit the text font size. This will override the size prop.
